tasks.task_description: Create new feature branch from main
Update test files to use Vitest syntax

description: Migrate from Jest to Vitest testing framework with complete documentation updates
context: Created new feature branch 'feat/migrate-to-vitest' from latest main branch
Removed Jest dependencies and installed Vitest with coverage and UI tools
Updated package.json scripts, created Vitest config and setup files, removed Jest configs
Successfully converted all remaining Jest syntax to Vitest syntax in test files. Fixed API route tests (contacts and boxes) and Contact component test. All 40 tests now pass with Vitest.
CI/CD workflows already use npm scripts (test:coverage, test:contract, test:e2e) which now run Vitest instead of Jest. No changes needed to workflow files.
Updated all documentation files to reflect Vitest migration: README.md, TESTING.md, ADR files, API.md, GIT_WORKFLOW.md, and renovate.json. Replaced all Jest references with Vitest equivalents.
Successfully tested the migration locally. All 40 tests pass with Vitest. Coverage reporting works correctly with v8 provider. Pre-commit hooks already use npm scripts so no changes needed.
